name: Iris Chang
title: Co-Head of Tech
desc: Iris is a Master's student studying Professional Writing and Business with a focus on communication design. This is her third year in AB Tech, where she does stage management. In her free time, she enjoys teaching her parakeets new tricks.

name: Shannon Ding
title: Co-Head of Tech
desc: Shannon is a senior studying computer science. She mostly does sound and stage management although is excited to learn about all aspects of Tech! In her spare time, she likes playing instruments, hiking, and audiobooks.

desc.name: Alex Strasser
desc.title: Co-Head of Tech
desc.desc: Alex Strasser is a senior studying ECE and Robotics. He enjoys repairing our equipment, doing lighting for events, and working with event organizers to make events meet their dreams!

desc.name: Felicia Liu
desc.title: Equipment Manager
desc.desc: Felicia is a sophomore studying ECE and BME. Within Tech, she mostly does lighting, but also dabbles in other areas like power and stage management. She loves movies, musicals, manga, and other form of visual media.

desc.name: Queenie Chen
desc.title: Finance Chair
desc.desc: Queenie is a sophomore in Business Administration with a minor in Drama. Inside AB Tech, she is mainly doing stage managing and lighting design. Queenie loves musicals.

desc.name: Stella Yim
desc.title: Personnel Manager
desc.desc: Stella is a sophomore studying mechanical engineering. In AB Tech she does a lot of sound and driving trucks. Sometimes she randomly does media or blasts K-pop in techroom while intensely playing UC Stones. Her preferred snacks from Entropy are are dark chocolate Kit-Kats and blue pomegranate Mountain Dew energy drinks.

desc.name: Zara Mansoor
desc.title: Internal Operations Chair
desc.desc: Zara is a sophomore studying Electrical and Computer Engineering. Sheâ€™s interested in sound in tech but hoping to learn more in other areas as well!

desc.name: Grace Kam
desc.title: Public Relations Chair
desc.desc: Grace is a sophomore studying Materials Science and Biomedical Engineering. She hasn't yet chosen a focus within AB Tech, but is interested in all areas. Her hobbies include baking, playing violin, and sleeping.

desc.name: Clarise Liu
desc.title: Training Chair
desc.desc: Clarise is a sophomore studying computer science. While she mainly does lighting & event management in AB Tech, she dabbles in other fields as well. Clarise loves music, animation, running, and anything colorful that makes sound.

desc.name: Greta Luo
desc.title: Recruitment & Retainment Chair
desc.desc: one time during soundcheck greta said toy boat toy boat over and over
